Song.title: Lift Up Your Eyes
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Mark Altrogge © 2002 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [E]Lift up your [E2/D#]eyes,{,} and [C#m7sus4]see Christ a[E2/B]bove [A]See how He [E/G#]pleads,{,} for the [F#m7]ones He has [Bsus4 B]loved [C#m]Gaze on the [C#m/B]wounds,{,} that ha[|3/8]ve [Amaj7]brought us [|6/8]to [F#sus4 F#]God And [A]take [E]heart,{,} He will [Bsus4]love [B]us for[C]ever[D E | C D2 E6 |]
Verse 2: [E]Lift up your [E2/D#]eyes,{,} and [C#m7sus4]see Christ en[E2/B]throned [A]His mighty [E/G#]Cross,{,} has [F#m7]vanquished His [Bsus4 B]foes And [C#m]soon comes a [C#m/B]day,{,} when [|3/8]to [Amaj7]Him all w[|6/8]ill [F#sus4 F#]bow And [A]take [E]heart,{,} He will [Bsus4]love [B]us for[C]ever[D E | C D2 E6 |]
Verse 3: [E]Lift up your [E2/D#]eyes,{,} His [C#m7sus4]glory pro[E2/B]claim For [A]God has ex[E/G#]alted,{,} the [F#m7]Lamb that was [Bsus4 B]slain And [C#m]someday our [C#m/B]eyes,{,} will lo[|3/8]ok [Amaj7]full on H[|6/8]is [F#sus4 F#]face And [A]take [E]heart,{,} He will [Bsus4]love [B]us for[C]ever[D E | C D2 E6 |]
Verse 4: [E]Lift up your [E2/D#]eyes,{,} to [C#m7sus4]Christ our High [E2/B]Priest Where [A]He has pre[E/G#]pared,{,} His [F#m7]great wedding [Bsus4 B]feast We’ll [C#m]drink of His [C#m/B]joy,{,} a[|3/8]nd [Amaj7]rest in H[|6/8]is [F#sus4 F#]love And [A]take [E]heart,{,} He will [Bsus4]love [B]us for[C]ever[D E | C D2 E6 |]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 lift up your eyes and see christ above see how he pleads for the ones he has loved gaze on the wounds that have brought us to god and take heart he will love us forever verse 2 lift up your eyes and see christ enthroned his mighty cross has vanquished his foes and soon comes a day when to him all will bow and take heart he will love us forever verse 3 lift up your eyes his glory proclaim for god has exalted the lamb that was slain and someday our eyes will look full on his face and take heart he will love us forever verse 4 lift up your eyes to christ our high priest where he has prepared his great wedding feast well drink of his joy and rest in his love and take heart he will love us forever
